titleStmt.title: Theatrum Scotiæ containing the prospects of Their Majesties castles and palaces : together with those of the most considerable towns and colleges, the ruins of many ancient abbeys, churches, monasteries and convents, within the said kingdom : all curiously engraven on copper plates, with a short description of each place / by John Slezer ...
titleStmt.author: Slezer, John, d. 1714.

titleStmt.title: Theatrum Scotiæ containing the prospects of Their Majesties castles and palaces : together with those of the most considerable towns and colleges, the ruins of many ancient abbeys, churches, monasteries and convents, within the said kingdom : all curiously engraven on copper plates, with a short description of each place / by John Slezer ...
titleStmt.author: Slezer, John, d. 1714.
Sibbald, Robert, Sir, 1641-1722.
Trenchard, John, Sir, 1640-1695.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Leake for Abell Swalle ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Proclamation at beginning of work signed: J. Trenchard.
The descriptions drawn up by Sir R. Sibbald were intended to be published in Latin, but were inaccurately translated into English without leave or acknowledgement of the author.
